recipe.title: Savory Sweet Potato Wedges Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Cut sweet potato into wedges. Set aside.
Prepare breading mixture in a large bowl and set aside. Whisk 2 eggs in a separate bowl.
Dip wedges, one by one, in the egg mixture followed by the breading mixture and place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until golden brown. For best results, flip halfway.

While wedges are baking, prepare the avocado dipping sauce by mashing the avocado with a fork until consistency is smooth and then adding the other ingredients. (You may also use a high speed blender or food processor.)

Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until golden brown.
While wedges are baking, prepare the avocado dipping sauce by mashing the avocado with a fork until consistency is smooth and then adding the other ingredients.
(You may also use a high speed blender or food processor.)
